thread.title: ​4 Companies Innovating In the World of Medical Marijuana | Men’s Health
thread.title_full: ​4 Companies Innovating In the World of Medical Marijuana | Men’s Health

title: ​4 Companies Innovating In the World of Medical Marijuana | Men’s Health

organizations.name: world of medical marijuana | men’s health

text: 1/4 Seedo Seedo It’s a hands-off planter for your weed, basically. Seedo promises “you literally don’t have to do a thing, from seed to harvest.” Think of it as a tiny greenhouse where you can shut your plants away and watch them grow, without any of the work. Comes with a “full spectrum LED system” and “automated delivery of minerals.” 2/4 Getty Images Octavia Wellness Home Sales If your grandma needs to get her smoke on, but doesn’t want to go down to the dispensary, she can lean on Octavia Wellness for home delivery. The company offers private, individualized service, as well as “large, easy-to-read labels.” Courteous! 3/4 Dr. Dabber Vap Pens Dr. Dabber Vape Pens Check out this luxurious description : “Three carefully calibrated heat settings allows you freedom to experiment, and a sleek, discreet satin finish keeps things low key.” Is this a vape pen, or the VIP room at a strip club? 4/4 Getty Images Honest Marijuana Naturally, one of the biggest concerns when buying marijuana from a new source is “What the eff else is in this batch of marijuana?” The down-home folks at Honest Marijuana are here to head that off, promising “organic marijuana from sustainable sources in the heart of Colorado.” Can you smell the crisp mountain air behind that dank kush?
